title: (x) NINE (the movie) font? / Grunge serif - Perio Clean {Tamas}
content:
Does anyone recognize the font used for this horrendous film?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100226141630im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nine_6143.jpg)
author: kiarostami

comments.content: Seems to be [Perio Clean](http://web.archive.org/web/20100226141630/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/aah-yes/perio/clean/) (an ironic name isn't it).
